message: The only reason that your pastor is not another Joel Osteen is because he can't find parishioners rich enough to put him in those digs. Every single opportunity that a preacher gets to make himself rich off of your tythes, he will take it, and there is nothing that the law will do about it. That opportunity to get rich off of an invisible product is one of the main reasons that religion was invented in the first place. And why do you think that you know Christianity better than anyone else? You are going off of the same book that Benny Hinn goes off of, and other millionaire preachers use to justify skimming. Don't be so sure that you have found the right way. You are basing your opinion off of the same bogus book that they are.
Monty Jones

Ending the seal hunt will destroy a part of Newfoundland's culture. These seals are killed in a quick and painless way. Idk about you guys but have you seen the videos on how they slaughter cows and chickens? Only adult seals are hunted and never the younger babies. These seals are overpopulated and are destroying our ecosystem as it is. Getting rid of the seal hunt would only create more problems. Paul McCartney said that he seen the slaughter first hand out on the ice, but all newfoundlanders know for a fact he never did go out there, he was actually at a studio in p.e.i.
